original_text: When the prince provides a freewill offering, either a burnt offering or peace offerings as a freewill offering to the Lord, the gate facing east shall be opened for him. And he shall offer his burnt offering or his peace offerings as he does on the Sabbath day. Then he shall go out, and after he has gone out the gate shall be shut.
korean_text: 만일 군주가 자원하여 번제를 준비하거나 혹은 자원하여 감사제를 준비하여 나 여호와께 드릴 때에는 그를 위하여 동쪽을 향한 문을 열고 그가 번제와 감사제를 안식일에 드림 같이 드리고 밖으로 나갈지며 나간 후에 문을 닫을지니라

sentences.original_text: When the prince provides a freewill offering,
either a burnt offering or peace offerings
as a freewill offering to the Lord,
the gate facing east shall be opened for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 동을 향한 문이 그를 위해 열릴 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: And he shall offer his burnt offering or his peace offerings
as he does on the Sabbath day.
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 하는 것과 같이 할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: and after he has gone out
